svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-12-30T11:41:38.174Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="xEKiQuonRCRIslp778Fz" version="22.1.16" type="device"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="_yZsw-NsXI2X_MQ437EC"> <mxGraphModel dx="4282" dy="1528" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-220" y="80" width="580" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-2" value="API" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-170" y="110" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-3" value="UI" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="110" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-5" value="DB" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="200" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-6" value="AUTH" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-170" y="200" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-7" value="Notifications SMS" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="155" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-8" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 36px;">Monolith</font></h1><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">Everything at one place</font></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 14px;"><br></font></span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Even for a small chnage the whole project needs to be compiled.&nbsp;</font></span><br></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-840" y="95" width="570" height="205" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-10" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 36px;">Micro-Service</font></h1><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Different services for Different architecture.&nbsp;</font></span><br></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Everything is independent in nature.</font></span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 24px;">All combine together becomes one app.</font></span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style=""><span style="font-size: 24px;">This is known as separation&nbsp;of concerns.</span></font></span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 24px;">SRP : Single Responsible Principle.</font></span></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-830" y="482" width="570" height="238" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-11" target="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-11" value="API" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-170" y="482" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-21" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.25;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-12" target="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-12" value="UI" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="486" width="120" height="52" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-19" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-13" target="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-50" y="580" /> <mxPoint x="70" y="580" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-13" value="AUTH" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-170" y="585" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-14" value="DB" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="585" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-15" value="AUTH" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="490" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-16" value="Emall" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="585" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9pPQrvZwpr73WjTSdX2h-22" value="<h1><span style="font-size: 36px;">How do they communicate?</span></h1><h1>Exposing them via api&nbsp;</h1><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">&nbsp;/api</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">/ auth&nbsp;</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div><span style="font-size: 24px;">Running them at different ports</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 24px;">:300</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 24px;">:8080</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 24px;">:7000</span></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-195" y="690" width="570" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
